description: China recently marked a significant stride in offshore oil production by unveiling its first-ever smart floating production storage and offloading (FPSO) system. This innovative platform integrates cutting-edge technologies, including artificial intelligence (AI), edge computing, cloud computing, big data, and the internet of things (IoT), through the implementation of AI Digital Twinning technology.  Meanwhile, across the […]
